Projects

Taskbull

A modern task management mobile application developed using React Native and Expo for my Final Year Project (FYP). It features a robust custom task prioritization algorithm and offers a comprehensive set of features to provide users with an efficient and user-friendly experience.

Currency Master

A mobile application developed using React Native and Expo as part of a Mobile Development Project. It fetches real-time exchange rate data from an API and allows users to perform currency conversions within the app.
